project.x-prompt: Which project are you adding GraphQL Code Generation to?

outputPath.description: The location where code is generated relative to the project root. Defaults to `src/lib/generated`.

schema.description: The schema location as an environment variable or URL. Defaults to `SCHEMA_ENDPOINT`.

schemaIsEnvironmentVariable.description: The schema location is an environment variable. Defaults to `true`.

skipClientPreset.description: Do not configure the client preset. Defaults to `false`.

skipValidation.description: Do not perform any validation on existing project. Defaults to `false`.
